import React, { useRef } from 'react' import Nav1 from "../component/Nav" import Footer from "../component/Footer" import { Card, Container,Row,Col,Form,Button} from "react-bootstrap"; import { newPassword } from '../config/Myservices'; import Validation from "../component/Validation" import jwt_decode from "jwt-decode"; export default function Newpass() { let token = localStorage.getItem("_token"); let decode = jwt_decode(token); let email = decode.uid; const oldRef = useRef(); const UpdatePassword = ()=>{ let data={values,email,oldRef:oldRef.current.value}; newPassword(data).then(res=>{ if(res.data.err){ alert(res.data.err) } else{ alert(res.data.msg) } }) } const { handler, values, errors, } = Validation(); return (
